objective.description: To provide easy, low-interest education loans to students of West Bengal so that financial constraints do not stop them from pursuing higher education and professional courses.
key_points: Covers tuition fees and education-related expenses
Government-facilitated loan with minimal burden on students

data.label: Interest Concession
data.value: 1% extra concession if interest is paid during study period

data.label: Repayment Starts
data.value: After course completion (as per bank norms)

eligibility.title: ‚úÖ Eligibility Criteria
conditions: Resident of West Bengal (permanent or long-term stay)
Age must be below 40 years at the time of application
Must be enrolled or admitted in a recognized institution
Applicable for UG / PG / Professional courses

rows: 1% concession for servicing interest during study period
State Cooperative Banks & Public/Private Sector Banks

documents_required.title: üìÑ Documents Required
student_documents: Aadhaar Card (or Class 10 Registration Certificate if Aadhaar unavailable)
guardian_documents: Guardian PAN Card (or PAN Undertaking Form)

application_process.title: üìù Application Process
steps: Step 1: Student fills online application on the official Student Credit Card portal
Step 2: Upload all required student & guardian documents

Step 5: Bank processes and sanctions the loan
